input_data.title: 100 Things to Do Before High School
input_data.overview: With real life and teen drama awaiting her after 8th grade graduation, CJ Martin has only a short time left to make the most of her middle school years. Together with her two lifelong best friends Fenwick and Crispo, she is determined to get the most out of this time, using an ever-expanding list of challenges as a guide. For this group, growing up means trying everything and taking chances while they still can.

response.analytical_summary: 100 Things to Do Before High School is a lighthearted comedy series centered on a group of friends navigating the transition from middle school to high school. The show explores themes of friendship, growing up, and seizing opportunities before adulthood arrives. It blends coming-of-age tropes with a focus on completing a list of activities, creating a framework for exploring personal growth and shared experiences. The series aims to evoke a sense of nostalgia and optimism, portraying the joys and anxieties of adolescence in a relatable and humorous way.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with CJ Martin, Fenwick, and Crispo realizing their time in middle school is limited. CJ creates a list of 100 things to do before high school, ranging from silly challenges to more significant milestones. Throughout the series, the friends tackle these activities, encountering various obstacles and learning valuable lessons about themselves and their relationships. They face typical teenage dilemmas, including crushes, social pressures, and the fear of change. As they progress through the list, the friends' bonds are tested, and they learn the importance of supporting each other through life's transitions. The series culminates in a bittersweet farewell to middle school, as the friends prepare to enter high school, carrying the memories and lessons learned from their shared experiences.
response.keyword_sentence: This lighthearted teen comedy series follows a group of best friends as they complete a challenge list to celebrate their transition from middle school to high school, embracing themes of friendship, opportunity, and growing up.
